item.title: New expanded visibility into multicloud data security in Microsoft Defender for Cloud
item.description:
Co-authors: Asaf Nakash (@Asaf_Nakash), Senior Program Manager, Microsoft Defender for Cloud @Catalin Esanu, Senior Program Manager, Microsoft Defender for Cloud
In recent years we’ve witnessed an accelerated migration of data to the cloud with data sprawl with security blind spots as unintended consequences. Attackers have turned their attention to finding these “unknown unknowns” and easily exploit unintentionally misconfigured and exposed cloud data resources.
